Home.content: The site provides all kinds of printing, printing books, posters, paper, personal cards and catalogs

About.header: Print everything you want from here easily
About.divOne: In the past, Helwan University students had to go outside the university to print books, banners, and other materials. However, now they can print anything they need within the university premises, including  banners, signs, cards, invitations, and books.
About.divTwo: In 2024, we established a print shop to enhance the facilities at Helwan University. We work as a team to ensure that we provide everything necessary for the university's improvement. our aim to assist all students to print what they want promptly and efficiently. We offer tips, inspiration and access to experts to aid in achieving their goals.
